title: CCC Clock Demonstration System
description: A comprehensive demonstration system for Composite Clock Comparison (CCC) using Θ-loop geometry and ABBA protocol for precision metrology applications.
notes: This software package provides a complete demonstration system for Composite Clock Comparison (CCC) techniques, including theoretical models, simulation tools, data analysis pipelines, and visualization components. The system implements the Θ-loop geometry with ABBA protocol for systematic error suppression in precision frequency comparisons.
references: Composite Clock Comparison Techniques in Precision Metrology
ABBA Protocol for Systematic Error Suppression
Θ-Loop Geometry in Atomic Clock Networks
